items.sentence: Tom promised not to tell anyone about what we did.
Tom promised to do everything he could to help me.
Tom drank about three times as much as Mary drank.
Tom figured that Mary would like to know the news.
This picture of Tom was taken in Boston last year.
Three beautiful ladies just walked into the lobby.
We can\'t let Tom practice piano so late at night.
You must bring your passport with you to the bank.
I can\'t thank you enough for what you did for me.
I didn\'t realize that you wanted me here at 2:30.
